alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 1:30PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains and Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. The cold and wet conditions could be dangerous for young livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will occur in Sheridan County, Wyoming.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
